package.name: IOS 16 Theme
package.shortDescription: IOS 16 Theme for older IOS versions.

descriptionlist.description: An IOS 16 theme(For IOS 5.0 or newer) by Appletech75, the owner of the HaxHive repository. Version 1.1 features the following icons: AppStore, Camera, FaceTime, Contacts, iTunes, Maps, and Calculator. Screenshots are available.

bugSection.title: Bug
bugSection.content: Custom Icons Have Black Corners, This Bug is getting fixed.
